channel.title: Sun realizes MoparScape is a disgrace to Java
channel.description:
Sun realizes MoparScape is a disgrace to Java; releases tools to teach young people to program in Java.
Discuss: http://java.sun.com/new2java/learning/young_developers.jsp

item.title: Sun realizes MoparScape is a disgrace to Java
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

JFormDesigner does me fine, for swing anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Sun realizes MoparScape is a disgrace to Java
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“communist, post:9, topic:278987”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=368226.msg2795712#msg2795712 date=1243057300]
I love it’s WYSIWYG designer.
[/quote]
And I hate the code it generates.[/quote]Isn’t there a plugin that changes that?

Read full topic

item.title: Sun realizes MoparScape is a disgrace to Java
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“communist, post:9, topic:278987”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=368226.msg2795712#msg2795712 date=1243057300]
I love it’s WYSIWYG designer.
[/quote]
And I hate the code it generates.[/quote]
The code it generates isn’t great, but the WYSIWYG designer is easy as hell to use, and it works correctly unlike some of the ones I’ve used.

Read full topic

item.title: Sun realizes MoparScape is a disgrace to Java
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“PeeHPee, post:5, topic:278987”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=368226.msg2790768#msg2790768 date=1242754131]

Hey Lets Teach Our Kids To Program Using Bloated Developement Tools Like NetBeans, Sounds Like A Great Idea To Me!
[/quote]how the fuck is it bloated? its an IDE

what i’m trying to say is, netbeans sucks dick.[/quote]

Netbeans is fine, I use it for clojure development because the plugin for it (enclojure) isn’t a piece of shit like the one for IDEA.

Read full topic
